title: Virtual Environment-Based Mathematics Pedagogy Design Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of secondary-level mathematics fundamentals and basic teaching profession knowledge
context.additional_context: Pre-service teacher training for in-service secondary teachers, emphasizing math pedagogy practice and reflective practice in virtual environments

learning_goals: Design effective teaching methods for secondary mathematics concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) in virtual environments (MUVE).
Develop and implement learner-centered mathematics lesson strategies through collaboration activities in virtual worlds.
Write self-assessment reports reflecting virtual class experiences through online blogging.

resources: Virtual Environment Platform (e.g., Second Life) License
3D Virtual Classroom Model for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
